term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - growth rate in biotechnology
term.title: growth rate

item.text: The measure (h-1,d-1) of the rate of growth or multiplication of an organism or a culture, usually expressed as specific growth rate (the increase of mass or cell number per time unit referred to the unit of mass, d(lnX)/dt).

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 156 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
